dynamo

Class NodeActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • dynamo.NodeActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class NodeActor
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    The actor which implements the functionality of a node in the Dynamo system

                                   java.lang.Integer itemKey)

        Parameters:

        itemKey - the key of the data item

        Parameters:

      • getLatestVersionItemFromResponses

        private Item getLatestVersionItemFromResponses()
        Returns the item with newer version number from the responses from the replicas
        Returns:
        an Item object with value, key and version number

      • handleReadResponseToClient

        private void handleReadResponseToClient()
        Decides what Item to send back to the client between the ones received by the replicas in the system, and then sends it.

      • issueUpdateToReplicas

        private void issueUpdateToReplicas(Item item)
        Sends success message to client and then tell the replicas to update their data item with the new value and latest version number.
        Parameters:
        item - the Item to be updated

      • requestPeersToRemote

        private void requestPeersToRemote(java.lang.String remotePath)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Request to a remote actor it list of peers to have knowledge of the network This method is blocking, i.e. it waits for the response from the remote actor and upon receiving it, it instantiated a new Ring object and copied the received list of Peers (adding also itself to the list) It is ok to make this method blocking because the network still does not have knowledge about this actor, so it is not possible to receive messages while we are waiting.
        Parameters:
        remotePath - The path of the remote actor
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If a Timeout occurs

      • announceSelfToSystem

        private void announceSelfToSystem()
        Send a message to everyone in the network (except to self) to announce the new node.

      • leaveSystem

        private void leaveSystem()
        Send a message to every one in the network (except to self) to account we are leaving the system.

      • resetVariables

        private void resetVariables()

      • scheduleTimeout

        private void scheduleTimeout(java.lang.Integer time,
                             java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit,
                             boolean init)
        Schedule a TimeoutMessage to self after
        Parameters:
        time - How many time units to wait
        unit - Specific time unit to use
        init - tells if this is a timeout regarding the initialization of the node or messages exchange for an operation
